nuts.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: I’m going to go nuts  (=become crazy) if I don’t find a new job soon.
Turn that radio off. It’s driving me nuts  (=annoying me very much).
nuts.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: used to emphasize that something bad or annoying has happened
nuts.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Nuts! Now we’re going to be late for the movie.
nuts.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: a lad mag (=magazine for young men) published weekly in the UK. It has many pictures of women wearing not much clothing and articles about cars, football, and other things that interest young men.
